stanza.line: Love is too young to know what conscienceis
Yet who knows not conscience is born of love
Then gentle cheater urge not myamiss
Lest guilty of my faults thy sweet self prove
For thou betraying me I dobetray
My nobler part to my gross bodytreason
My soul doth tell my body that hemay
Triumph in love flesh stays no fartherreason
But rising at thy name doth point outthee
As his triumphant prize proud of thispride
He is contented thy poor drudge tobe
To stand in thy affairs fall by thyside
No want of conscience hold it that Icall
Her love for whose dear love I rise andfall
